name: Mom's out
description:
Some days, mom’s out and together with your dad you have to entertain yourselves. Fortunately, the house has been built like a video game level! Find keys that give you a glimpse of your next generations. 

Mom is out is a coop puzzle game. Your goal is to travel through  time and space.  To do so, you get to play as both the dad and the baby with your friend and together you have to figure out how to pass through room after room. 

Our team :

  • Christophe BOLDUC, online programmer
  • Vincent BOULET, level builder and camara programmer
  • Alexandre MORIN,  3D artist
  • Paul-Louis RENARD,  animation programmer
  • Olivier SANTERRE, mecanics programmer
  • Louis-Philippe SEGUIN, 3D artist and voice-over
  • Jade TAM, 2D artist
